Technical Risk Consultant ●Project Manager ● Motivational Speaker
I am a delivery focused Product Manager with extensive experience
in delivering market driven, quality software products. These world
leading products have grown market share and increased profit by a
minimum of 20% year on year throughout the duration of my product
ownership and management. 
I am a huge advocate for Agile methods with over 15 years
experience of implementation and use. I am actively engaged in
all stages of the product lifecycle; I gather and prioritise customer
requirements, manage the backlog and road map. As a hands-
on product manager, I am responsible for the digitalisation of our
products, web solutions, visualisation of the data, UX design,
conducting product support, assure quality and validation testing,
and support the team through to product release, training customers,
technical support and sales teams. 
I possess excellent domain knowledge gained from 25 years of
experience in chemical and power industries, covering the following
areas; Lubrication, Oil Quality, Quantitative Risk Assessment (QRA)
and risk consultancy, technical support, test management, project
management, business development, training and agile software
development.
I am determined to succeed both professionally and personally as
demonstrated by successfully rowing across the Atlantic Ocean

and raising over £500,000 for charity. Leading to being personally
nominated and awarded runner up in the Beacon Award.

Product Manager of Shell Remote Sense: Took an IOT Service from

Being a start up and initially a small team, I have had to be fully flexible and
tackle whatever was priority, be that implementation, installation, logistics,
training, testing, Project Management, customer relations or sales. However
now my main role is Product Owner. This involves all activities relating to
the Product, from market needs sourcing and prioritisation, requirements

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
For the last 6 years. I have been managing the entire product line life cycle
from strategic planning to tactical activities for Phast and Safeti, market
leading software. Each year breaking records and increase market share and
profitability.
Specifying market requirements for current and future products by conducting
market research supported by on-going visits to customers and non-customers
as well as excellent product knowledge.
Driving a solution set across development teams (primarily Development/

Developing and implementing a vision, road map, scope and design by

Analyzing potential partner relationships for the product.
Implementing Software as a service to reach a wider market.
